mapper.select: /* bot.xml selectBotWordSaveAll */ SELECT RES FROM ( SELECT '1' AS ORD ,RES FROM (SELECT A.REQ || ' => ' || LISTAGG(A.RES, ', ') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY A.RES) AS RES FROM TBOT_WORD_SAVE A WHERE A.ROOM_NAME = #{roomName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.LIMIT_YN = '0' GROUP BY A.REQ ORDER BY REQ) UNION SELECT '2' ,LISTAGG(B.IN_PRM, ', ') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY B.IN_PRM) || ' => ' || B.OUT_PRM FROM TBOT_IMG_MCH B GROUP BY B.OUT_PRM) ORDER BY ORD
